name: World Infector
description:
This is my first game I made. It was created during Godot Wild Jam # 33.
There were big plans to add a lot of things, but time ran out.

We play the role of a Dark Magician. Our task is to gather an army of minions to take revenge on the mages who banished us. Our first target is the creatures from the nearby forest and their spiritual guardian - a large mushroom called Yayway.

Will Bloomstein get his revenge?

Will he gain enough strength?

Will he defeat Yayway?

I do not know. But maybe you will find out how one day I manage to finish this game. The game itself is only a prologue to further events.
